function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Manual extraction of dust from filters","Impact":"Risk of contaminating the samples and spreading potential pathogens","Mitigation":"Use of automated extraction methods or strict aseptic techniques","Technologies":"Automated extraction machines, aseptic techniques","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, researchers"},{"Description":"Storage of dust samples at 280°C","Impact":"Risk of degrading DNA and compromising sample integrity","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate storage conditions such as -80°C freezers","Technologies":"-80°C freezers, temperature monitoring systems","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Sequencing bacterial communities","Impact":"Risk of exposing individuals to potential pathogenic bacteria during sequencing process","Mitigation":"Use of biocontainment measures and personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Biocontainment chambers, personal protective equipment","People":"Laboratory technicians, sequencing personnel","Owner":"Laboratory management"}]}
